short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the names of users in Twitch chat with a name of your choice! Then you can try to guess who is who!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces all names in Twitch chat to a name of your choice! This was inspired by Twitch streamer lil_indigestion, because he wanted a way to hide chatters' names and try to guess who they were based on context.

By default, the extension changes all names to "Luke" and can be changes in the extension popup. There you can also choose options to hide user badges and colors, to make guessing even more challenging!
